body_html: I haven't seen anything pointing in that direction @F3PiX. The upgrade guide for v3 does not have anything regarding credentials in it. And the guide for upgrading within the v2 versions has some bits around credentials, but nothing should be "current" enough for having caused our problem I think.
body_text: I haven't seen anything pointing in that direction @F3PiX. The upgrade guide for v3 does not have anything regarding credentials in it. And the guide for upgrading within the v2 versions has some bits around credentials, but nothing should be "current" enough for having caused our problem I think.
body: I haven't seen anything pointing in that direction @F3PiX. The [upgrade guide](https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-ruby/blob/master/V3_UPGRADING_GUIDE.md) for v3 does not have anything regarding credentials in it. And the guide for [upgrading within the v2 versions](https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-ruby/blob/master/UPGRADING.md) has some bits around credentials, but nothing should be "current" enough for having caused our problem I think.
